verses.roman:
dvidhā nā bhāviha, nā kariha kichu mane
viśvāsa kari' candana deha āmāra vacane

synonyms: dvidhā nā bhāviha—do not hesitate; nā kariha—do not do; kichu—anything; mane—in the mind; viśvāsa kari'-believing Me; candana—sandalwood; deha—offer; āmāra vacane—under My order.
translation: "You should not hesitate to act according to My order. Believing in Me, just do what is needed."
